Hi guys does Atome affect ur credit score

Taking installment credit wonâ€™t directly impact your credit rating. You can even improve your credit rating by paying the amount in monthly payments on time. However  if for some reason or the other you fall back on your payments or miss any installments  then retailers often retain the right to do a hard check  in which case  your credit score might get impacted negatively.https://www.atome.sg/blog/understand-installment-credit-and-how-to-use-it
